Formatting research articles for specific journals is a pain. Fortunately, there are templates that make this much easier, along with templates for other publications.

## Learning objectives

* Use `{papaja}` templates to format APA manuscripts
* Use `{papaja}`'s functions to format statistics and numbers
* Use templates for pre-registrations, revision letters, and dissertations
